==Japanese==

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|おんな まほうし}}

* {{ja-r|魔女|まじょ}}

===Etymology 2===
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=おんなまほうし|女|tr1=onna|t1=female|魔|tr2=ma|t2=evil|法師|tr3=hōshi|t3=priestess, nun}}.

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|おんな まほうし}}

# A [[evil]] [[priestess]] or [[nun]]

====Synonyms====
* {{ja-r|女魔法士|おんな まほうし}}: a evil priestess/nun
* {{ja-r|黒神子|くろ みこ}}
